version_description:
✔ The app is now much smaller in size (MB).
✔ Less bugs, more fun.

THREE NEW ACCESSORIES:
FIREFIGHTER HELMET - Firefighter Tom is in the house!
HOT DOG HAT - Have Tom look silly with a new hot dog hat.
GREEN PLAID SHIRT - Keep Tom warm with a new shirt that matches his eyes.

THREE NEW ACCESSORIES:
FRUIT HAT - What is this fruit doing on Tom’s head?
SHIRT AND TIE - Oh yes, Tom looks very classy in this outfit!
BUNNY HAT - Ha ha ha, you’ve never seen Tom looking more silly!

✔ Improved internet connectivity in China
✔ Other minor bug fixes

THREE NEW ACCESSORIES:
Diving Mask: Dive in, have fun!
Soda Hat: Remember to drink your fluids!
Surfboard: Surf's up, dude!

BUG FIXES: Less bugs means more fun!

✔ New app icon
✔ App translated into French, German, Italian, Spanish and Portuguese
✔ Several bugs fixed

SCHOOL IS BACK!
Dress your Talking Tom as a nerd or tell the world what you think with the new "School Sucks" T-shirt!
Fixed a crash in mini-game after upgrading from 4.0.

IS THAT A T-SHIRT FOR GIRLS?
Pink? Seriously? But this is no ordinary T-shirt. Check it out!

NEWER AND BETTER THAN EVER!
Talking Tom 2 is now bug free, iOS 8 ready, and more awesome than ever! 

2 BILLION DOWNLOADS!
You guys have downloaded the Talking Tom and Friends apps over 2 billion times. Thank you!

NEW WARDROBE ITEMS: Give your Tom a bit of extra fashion flair with a sombrero and a Hawaiian shirt! 
BUG FIXES: We’ve zapped and polished to make the app bug-free. Take a look – it’s better than ever!

NEW T-SHIRT: Only the best bubble shooters get to wear the Mars Pop T-shirt!
BUG FIXES: We fixed YouTube related bug.

NEW VIDEO GALLERY: Lights. Camera. Action! From now on you can watch Talking Tom and Friends animated series, shorts and other videos inside the app. So just press play and enjoy the view.
BUG FIXES: We've fixed the bugs, we've made super improvements.
FINALLY! A NEW MINI GAME! Are you fast enough? Test your tapping skills and earn gold coins in the Tap Tap game.
FINALLY! A NEW MINI GAME! Are you fast enough? Test your tapping skills and earn gold coins in the Tap Tap game.
FINALLY! A NEW MINI GAME! Are you fast enough? Test your tapping skills and earn gold coins in the Tap Tap game.
Fixed in-app purchase bug.
NEW SUMMER OUTFIT! Check out the awesome Sharky T-Shirt.
Bug fixes and minor gameplay improvements.

Have fun with the one and only Talking Tom Cat! Play with him, poke him, and talk to him – he’ll repeat what you say in a hilarious voice. And you can even make funny videos and share them with your friends!
